attributes.action: burgh road from carlisle to port carllsle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This road is dangerous,I would defy any person from the government to come and inspect this road and say it is ok.I am a local business (caravan park) with over 1000 residents.Every customer has complained about the lack of repairs to this road from Burgh By Sands to Port Carlisle.When some one gets killed or injured on this road i would like to make sure i have done as much as i can to prevent this. I hope the right people are made accountable if a tragedy happens.CAN WE HAVE THE ROAD MADE SAFE TO THE REQUIRED STANDARTS
 BECAUSE CUMBRIA HIHGWAYS ARE DOING NOTHING ABOUT THE REPAIRS WOULD YOU ACCEPT THIS PETITION THANKS

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

At the moment the petition reads:

We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to burgh road from carlisle to port carllsle
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
